content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I understand that you're interested in renting my apartment in München. Let's discuss the price. How much are you willing to pay per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm very interested in your apartment, especially since it's located in the city center and has all the amenities I'm looking for. I appreciate the opportunity to negotiate the price. I believe I can offer a fair amount that reflects the value of the apartment. Would you be willing to consider a price lower than your initial expectations?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, I'm glad to hear that you find my apartment attractive. While I'm open to negotiations, I must emphasize that I'm looking to achieve a fair market price that reflects the value of the property. I'm curious to hear your proposed price. Please make an offer, and we can discuss it further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I've been looking at similar apartments in the area, and I believe a price around 900 Euro per month would be reasonable. This is based on the size and location of the apartment, as well as the fact that it's unfurnished. I hope this offer aligns with your expectations and we can reach an agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, your offer of 900 Euro per month is well within the range I had considered for this apartment. However, given the high demand for properties in the city center and the recent construction of the apartment, I was hoping for a slightly higher price. Would you be willing to increase your offer slightly to reflect the premium location and modern amenities?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position. The location and amenities of your apartment are indeed premium. I'm willing to negotiate further. How about 950 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise that takes into account both the value of the apartment and my budget. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, your offer of 950 Euro per month is more in line with the market value I was expecting for this apartment. However, I must confess that I was hoping for a price closer to 1000 Euro per month. This would better reflect the investment I've made in the apartment's construction and the convenience of its central location. Would you be able to meet me at this price?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your request for 1000 Euro per month is at the upper limit of what I can afford. While I appreciate the quality and location of your apartment, I must consider my budget. Could we find a middle ground between 950 Euro and 1000 Euro? Perhaps 975 Euro per month? This would be a good balance for both of us. What do you think?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, your offer of 975 Euro per month is a step in the right direction. It's closer to the price I had in mind, but I'm still slightly hesitant. The apartment's proximity to public transportation and amenities does add significant value. Would you be willing to come up just a bit more, say, 985 Euro per month? This would be a fair deal for both parties, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence is commendable. I can see that you're confident in the value of your apartment. I'm willing to meet you at 985 Euro per month. This price reflects the quality of the apartment and the convenience of its location. I believe it's a fair deal, and I'm ready to sign the lease if you agree to this price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu Wang, I'm pleased to hear that you're willing to meet my asking price of 985 Euro per month. This is indeed a fair deal, and I appreciate your understanding of the apartment's value. Let's proceed with the lease signing. Thank you for your time and cooperation in this negotiation. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
